QueryViewSpec.Name: MIMED Interest Departments Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: A view defined for querying on MIMED interest department records
QueryViewSpec.Author: UM Dev

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: SELECT IDEPT.ID, IDEPT.INTERESTID, IDEPT.DEPARTMENTID, IDEPT.SUBDEPARTMENTID, DEPT.NAME AS UMHS_DEPARTMENT, SUBDEPT.NAME AS UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT, IDEPT.DATEADDED, IDEPT.DATECHANGED, ADDEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME AS ADDEDBY_APPLICATION, ADDEDBY.USERNAME AS ADDEDBY_USERNAME, CHANGEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME AS CHANGEDBY_APPLICATION, CHANGEDBY.USERNAME AS CHANGEDBY_USERNAME FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_INTERESTDEPTSUBDEPT IDEPT INNER JOIN DBO.USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT DEPT ON DEPT.ID = IDEPT.DEPARTMENTID INNER JOIN DBO.USR_UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT SUBDEPT ON SUBDEPT.ID = IDEPT.SUBDEPARTMENTID LEFT OUTER JOIN DBO.CHANGEAGENT ADDEDBY ON ADDEDBY.ID = IDEPT.ADDEDBYID LEFT OUTER JOIN DBO.CHANGEAGENT CHANGEDBY ON CHANGEDBY.ID = IDEPT.CHANGEDBYID
